attributes.action: Assess potential Russian interference in the EU referendum & publish a  summary.
attributes.additional_details: It is very much in the public interest that it is established and made known what, if any Russian influence was brought to bear on the EU referendum, particularly in light of the  current economic situation post Brexit and against the background of COVID-19.
attributes.background:
According to the Russia report, the committee had "not been provided with any post-referendum assessment of Russian
attempts at interference", and it is their view that the UK Intelligence Community should produce an assessment of potential Russian  and publish a summary.
